'''v0.8.1 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on December 18, 2013 for Android and on December 19, 2013 for iOS. It fixes some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.8.0 alpha|v0.8.0 alpha]]. This is the final version released in 2013.

== Changes ==

'''[[File:Charcoal JE3 BE3.png|width=32x32]] [[Charcoal]]'''
* Texture has been changed to [[Java Edition|Java]]'s 1.6 texture.

'''[[File:Zombified Piglin BE1.png|width=53x53]] [[Zombified Piglin|Zombie Pigmen]]'''
* No longer take [[damage]] when burning in the daylight.
